new_issues.text: Entity Relationship Diagram showing the core Chinook database schema with Artists, Albums, and Tracks entities. Artists have a one-to-many relationship with Albums, and Albums have a one-to-many relationship with Tracks. All entities include standard fields like id, public_id, timestamps, and soft delete support.
